job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Participate in the design and development of features and services, resolving technical problems as they arise
     * Take ownership of the entire development process, from design to production, ensuring quality, automation tests, and efficient deployment
     * Oversee the maintenance and improvement of existing functionality, ensuring code quality and alignment with business needs
     * Encourage and facilitate the generation of innovative engineering ideas and solutions within the team
     * Solution design for customer integrations and communication with the customer's technical team
     * Managing onboarding implementation projects for enterprise and large customers
     * Tracking and communicating project status, issues, decisions, and action items to internal and external key stakeholders as needed
     * Team performance management and PDP (Professional Development Plan) for team members
     * Scrum ceremonies facilitation
job_details.full_text:
Senior Python Engineer

* Participate in the design and development of features and services, resolving technical problems as they arise
     * Take ownership of the entire development process, from design to production, ensuring quality, automation tests, and efficient deployment
     * Oversee the maintenance and improvement of existing functionality, ensuring code quality and alignment with business needs
     * Encourage and facilitate the generation of innovative engineering ideas and solutions within the team
     * Solution design for customer integrations and communication with the customer's technical team
     * Managing onboarding implementation projects for enterprise and large customers
     * Tracking and communicating project status, issues, decisions, and action items to internal and external key stakeholders as needed
     * Team performance management and PDP (Professional Development Plan) for team members
     * Scrum ceremonies facilitation

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software engineering, project management, and team leadership rather than AI-specific tasks like model development, fine-tuning, or generative AI applications. While Python is mentioned, it's in the context of general software engineering, not AI model implementation.

phrases: design and development of features and services
resolving technical problems as they arise
Take ownership of the entire development process, from design to production
ensuring quality, automation tests, and efficient deployment
Oversee the maintenance and improvement of existing functionality
communication with the customer's technical team
job_tasks.justification: These phrases describe core software engineering activities, including feature development, problem-solving, end-to-end ownership, testing, deployment, maintenance, and integration design, which are all hallmarks of software development.

phrases: Managing onboarding implementation projects for enterprise and large customers
Tracking and communicating project status, issues, decisions, and action items to internal and external key stakeholders
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate a need to understand business requirements, manage customer-facing projects, and communicate effectively with stakeholders, aligning technical work with business objectives.
While not explicitly MLOps, 'efficient deployment' touches upon the operational aspects of getting software into production, which is a component of MLOps.

phrases: Take ownership of the entire development process
Encourage and facilitate the generation of innovative engineering ideas and solutions
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to taking responsibility for work and fostering innovation, aligning with the 'Innovation & Ownership' soft skill.

phrases: communication with the customer's technical team
Tracking and communicating project status, issues, decisions, and action items to internal and external key stakeholders
job_tasks.justification: These phrases highlight the need for clear and consistent communication with both internal and external parties, including technical teams and stakeholders.

phrases: resolving technical problems as they arise
ensuring code quality and alignment with business needs
job_tasks.justification: The ability to resolve technical issues and ensure code quality in alignment with business needs demonstrates problem-solving and a pragmatic approach.

soft_skills.name: Take ownership of the entire development process
Encourage and facilitate the generation of innovative engineering ideas and solutions
communication with the customer's technical team
Tracking and communicating project status, issues, decisions, and action items to internal and external key stakeholders
resolving technical problems as they arise
ensuring code quality and alignment with business needs
